title: A Day in Perth
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Greg Reading
brief_description: Perth is a city growing towards the day when it assumes its place as one of the world’s industrial centres. Recent discoveries of iron ore and other minerals in Western Australia have brought new wealth to the State. Perth is a prosperous city, with a warm, sunny climate, and a relaxed, outdoor way of life.
